# Copilot Realtime Interview

> AI-powered real-time voice assistant for interviews and conversations - uses your own OpenAI API key.

## Overview
Open source web application that provides real-time AI voice assistance through audio transcription and intelligent responses powered by OpenAI Realtime API.

## Core Features
- [Home](/) - Real-time AI voice assistant
- [Dashboard](/dashboard) - Voice assistance control center
- [AI Settings](/app/settings/ai) - Configure templates and customize AI behavior

## Key Benefits
- **Pre-Built Templates**: General Assistant, Technical Interview, Meeting Notes, Education, Customer Support, Content Creation
- **Silent Mode**: Mute bot voice, read text responses - use discreetly anywhere
- **Real-time Transcription**: High accuracy, even with specialized terminology
- **Instant AI Responses**: OpenAI Realtime API powered intelligence
- **Custom Templates**: Create templates for any specific workflow
- **Screen Capture**: Capture important visuals for later reference
- **Web App**: Works alongside any platform, no installation needed
- **Bring Your Own Key**: Uses your own OpenAI API key

## Technical Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 15, TypeScript, React 18
- **AI Models**: OpenAI Realtime API
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI

## Use Cases & Templates
- **General Assistant**: Default multi-purpose voice assistance
- **Technical Interview**: Coding and system design help
- **Meeting Notes**: Real-time transcription and action items
- **Education & Learning**: Tutoring and explanations
- **Customer Support**: Call assistance and response suggestions
- **Content Creation**: Writing and brainstorming assistance
- **Custom Templates**: Create your own for any workflow

## Privacy & Security
- **No Audio Recording**: Audio is processed in real-time and immediately discarded
- **Local Configuration**: All settings stored locally in your browser
- **Your Own API Key**: Data goes directly to OpenAI, not through our servers

## Source Code
- GitHub: https://github.com/carlitose/copilot_real_time_interview

## Last Updated
2025-12-11
